name: Doodle Jamboree
description: Play as a drawing and explore a world of paper scraps and sketches in a quirky, delightful doodle extravaganza!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: 2GHz Dual-Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia/AMD graphics card with up-to-date drivers Storage: 250 MB available space Additional Notes: WebGL renderer essential
